title: Iraq’s Prime Minister Survives Assassination Attempt, Government Says
sub_head: Mustafa al-Kadhimi wasn’t harmed; armed drone is said to have targeted his home in Baghdad’s Green Zone
body:
BAGHDAD—The Iraqi government said Prime Minister Mustafa al-Kadhimi has survived an assassination attempt with an armed drone and is unharmed.
In a statement released early Sunday, the government said the drone tried to hit Mr. al-Kadhimi’s home in Baghdad’s heavily fortified Green Zone area. Residents of Baghdad heard the sound of an explosion followed by gunfire from the direction of the Green Zone, which houses foreign embassies and government offices.
